description:

This locket fuses together vintage and tribal styles to create an on-trend piece like no other. The locket opens to reveal two oval chambers - perfect for concealing photos of loved ones. Unusually, the depth of the chambers on this locket is 3-4mm, making it a fantastic vessel for smaller three-dimensional items that bear importance to the wearer.

The locket has external dimensions of 4.2cm x 3.2cm and fastens with a lobster clasp at the back. Different length chains are available - simply select your option from the drop-down menu. Please note: model wears 17" chain.

The locket is made from nickel free brass and will develop a patina over time, giving the piece an aged effect. If you prefer a newer look, this patina can be cleaned away using a brass cleaner keeping it looking as good as the day it was purchased. The chain is made from gold-plated nickel free brass.

name: Lakota - Silver Double Eagle Tribal Necklace with Coral and Turquoise Beaded Accents
description:
Lakota is taken from the name of a Native American tribe, who give Eagle feathers to honor bravery. The eagle in Native American culture is associated with trust, strength, wisdom, power and freedom and possessing just one of its feathers is a great accolade. The feathers, once bestowed, must never be dropped on the floor and must be displayed in their headpieces as a reminder to all to behave honorably. So this one's for all you trustworthy, strong, wise, powerful and free spirits out there! 

Lakota consists of a double eagle charm in silver ox, stunning opaque Czech firepolished beads in coral and turquoise and stainless steel chain. The pendant measures 45x38mm and the chain-length is determined by you - simply select an option from the drop-down menu.

name: Recorded Signed For Delivery (UK only)
description: To opt in for Royal Mail's Recorded Signed For delivery add this to your cart. Your package will require a signature on delivery.

name: Airsure Service - International Priority Delivery with Tracking
description:
If you live in any of the international destinations listed below and would like to receive your parcel quicker and track your parcel add this service to your cart. Royal Mail's Airsure delivery aim is 2-6 days. As soon as your parcel has been shipped you will receive an e-mail with the tracking information. 

PLEASE NOTE: This service DOES NOT require a signature on delivery.

Airsure is available for the following countries:

EU: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Latvia, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Portugal, Republic of Ireland, Spain, Sweden

Rest of the World: Andorra, Australia, Azores, Balearic Islands, Brazil, Canada, Canary Islands, Corsica, Faroe Islands, Hong Kong, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Madeira, Malaysia, Monaco, Singapore, Switzerland, New Zealand and USA countries.

All other international customers wanting to track their Penny Masquerade parcel, please add our International Signed For postage upgrade to your basket. Please note, International Signed For is not a priority service.
